HDG.ID.content: matter of thinking handed down in West under name “Being” > Heidegger tells us that Being of beings is genitivus objectivus; beings of Being genitivus subjectivus > subject & object stem from Being, so in either case we deal w/ difference [control genitive]
HDG.ID.linkedContent: matter of thinking handed down in West under name “Being” > Heidegger tells us that Being of beings is genitivus objectivus; beings of Being genitivus subjectivus > subject & object stem from Being, so in either case we deal w/ difference [control genitive]

HDG.WM.content: humans tend to seek when they’ve anticipated being at hand, is there a search w/out anticipation (Vorwegnahme), to which pure discovery belongs [totally other]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.WM.linkedContent: humans tend to seek when they’ve anticipated being at hand, is there a search w/out anticipation (Vorwegnahme), to which pure discovery belongs [totally other]

HDG.WM.content: for philosophy to get underway: 1) allow space for beings as a whole 2) release ourselves into the nothing, liberate ourselves from idols 3) let sweep of our suspense (Schwebens) take its full course, so it swings back to fundamental question of metaphysics [possibility of “why” makes it possible to ground things > destiny of our existence placed in hands of researcher (Forschers) (Nietzsche)] [destiny, question, ground of metaphysics, beyond metaphysics]

HDG.CCP.content: night slows us down, leaves us time to meditate > still far from human habitation [Aristotle] > “ever more openly I am coming to trust in the inconspicuous guide who takes us by the hand” > unaccustomed task, difficult

motif.name: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"
motif.title: DERRIDA CONFESSES, SUMMARIZES in "Punctuations: the Time of a Thesis"

HDG.EC.content: [facetiously?] what’s more necessary than “getting down to businesses with the given facts (Zupacken im Gegebenen), remaking what is present at hand, and moving forward w/ what has existed before (Vorwärtsbringen des Bisherigen)”? > that factual sense of reality (Tatsachensinn) lets man stand squarely on ground, validates, secures, effectuates (wirken), holds fast—and yet can’t be w/out the unnecessary (Unnötige)
HDG.EC.linkedContent: [facetiously?] what’s more necessary than “getting down to businesses with the given facts (Zupacken im Gegebenen), remaking what is present at hand, and moving forward w/ what has existed before (Vorwärtsbringen des Bisherigen)”? > that factual sense of reality (Tatsachensinn) lets man stand squarely on ground, validates, secures, effectuates (wirken), holds fast—and yet can’t be w/out the unnecessary (Unnötige)

HDG.OHF.content: re: Aristotle’s Peri Ermēneias, solely important [in this context] re: history of meaning of word: discourse (Rede) makes something accessible (zugänglich), brings out into open, ready to hand (vorhanden) > thus logos has distinctive possibility of alētheuein (being-true), making what was concealed unconcealed [comes to light through logos]

motif.name: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)
motif.title: CALL AND RESPONSE (WELCOME OF THE OTHER, ETHICAL OPENING)

HDG.OHF.content: we can find the way our today regards the past in historical human sciences: they hand over historical past as finished/readily available possession
HDG.OHF.linkedContent: we can find the way our today regards the past in historical human sciences: they hand over historical past as finished/readily available possession

HDG.OHF.content: [phenomenology beyond dialectic] dialectic directionless (richtungslos) when no Grundblick in direction of (auf) the subject matter (Sache), a rationality testing/proving itself by looking this way (i.e. not dialectically) [Heidegger uses rationality affirmatively here?] > all dialectic lives from table of others, Hegel: “this traditional material” (Plato, Aristotle) “extremely importance source, indeed a necessary condition [and] presupposition to be gratefully acknowledged” (Science of Logic) > dialectic is double-sidedly un-radical: 1) lives from hand to mouth 2) eloquent about readymade material
